title: Simple Summer Smoothie
paragraphe: I just gathered together my favorite fruits and added what else was needed. If you like, use a multigrain bar (I use Entenmann's strawberry flavored), crumble it, and sprinkle some on top of each smoothie
steps: Place the banana, strawberries, blueberries, cherries, and ice cubes into a blender
Pour in the orange juice, vanilla yogurt, and honey
Puree until smooth
nutrition: 139 calories; protein 3.6g; carbohydrates 31.1g; fat 1.2g; cholesterol 2.3mg; sodium 33.5mg

title: Heavenly Blueberry Smoothie
paragraphe: This blueberry smoothie is to die for! It tastes so good, you forget that it's good for y
ingrediants: 1 frozen banana, thawed for 10 to 15 minutes
steps: Cut banana into small pieces and place into the bowl of a blender
Add the soy milk, yogurt, flax seed meal, and honey
Blend on lowest speed until smooth, about 5 seconds
Gradually add the blueberries while continuing to blend on low
Once the blueberries have been incorporated, increase speed, and blend to desired consistency.
nutrition: 250 calories; protein 9.5g; carbohydrates 50.2g; fat 2.6g; cholesterol 2mg; sodium 116.8mg

title: Papaya Passion Smoothie
paragraphe: This is the most delicate, creamiest papaya smoothie ever. It is very refreshing and tasty
ingrediants: 2 cups papaya - peeled, seeded and cubed
steps: Place papaya, milk, sugar, condensed milk, yogurt, cream cheese, and ice in a blender
Blend until smooth
Serve immediately
nutrition: 184 calories; protein 6.4g; carbohydrates 29.4g; fat 5g; cholesterol 18.2mg; sodium 92.2mg

title: Mint and Fruit Smoothie
paragraphe: This quick, frosty blender recipe has a thick texture, beautiful colors, and a fruity, mojito-like taste
ingrediants: ¼ cup red seedless grapes, frozen
¼ cup unsweetened applesauce, or to taste
steps: Place frozen grapes, applesauce, and lime juice into a blender.
Puree until smooth
Add frozen strawberries, cubed pineapple, and mint leaves
Pulse a few times until the strawberries and pineapple are in small bits
nutrition: 92 calories; protein 0.8g; carbohydrates 24.1g; fat 0.3g; sodium 2.3mg

title: Energetic Strawberry Smoothie
paragraphe: This is a very simple strawberry smoothie. I learned the recipe from my friends who work at Mercer's cafe
ingrediants: 1 (8.3 ounce) can citrus flavored energy drink (e.g. Red Bull™)
steps: In the container of a blender, combine the energy drink and frozen strawberries
Blend until smooth and creamy, about 1 minute
nutrition: Add some water if blending is difficult. Pour into 2 big glasses

title: Nourish & Refresh Smoothie
paragraphe: Take a break on a busy afternoon for a quick and delicious spinach, banana, cherry, and coconutmilk-almondmilk smoothie
ingrediants: 1 cup Almond Breeze Coconutmilk Almondmilk Original Unsweetened
steps: Place all ingredients into blender and blend on high until smooth
nutrition: 135 calories; protein 2.5g; carbohydrates 22.8g; fat 4.2g; sodium 128.5mg

title: Berry Apricot Smoothie
paragraphe: Banana, berries, fresh apricots, chia seeds, and protein powder blended with almondmilk make a quick and filling breakfast or snack
ingrediants: 1 ½ cups Original Unsweetened Almond Breeze Almondmilk
steps: Place all ingredients into blender and blend on high until smooth
nutrition: 198 calories; protein 10.8g; carbohydrates 31.4g; fat 4.5g; sodium 190.6mg

title: Yam Smoothie
paragraphe: A delicious way to use up your blueberries
steps: Prick yams with a fork, and place on a plate
Cook in the microwave for 8 to 10 minutes, turning once, until tender
Cool, peel and dice.
Combine the yams, yogurt, milk, ice cubes, sugar and banana in the container of a blender
Blend until smooth
nutrition: 227 calories; protein 7.2g; carbohydrates 45.9g; fat 2g; cholesterol 7mg; sodium 82.3mg

title: Bananerberry Smoothie
paragraphe: A delicious way to use up your blueberries
steps: In a blender combine strawberries, banana, peaches, apples, and ice cream.
Blend until smooth
Add ice, pour in milk and blend again until smooth.
Serve immediately
nutrition: 354 calories; protein 6.8g; carbohydrates 57.8g; fat 12.6g; cholesterol 48.4mg; sodium 108.7mg

title: Blueberry Smoothie
paragraphe: A delicious way to use up your blueberries
steps: Blend the blueberries, yogurt, milk, sugar, vanilla, and nutmeg in a blender until frothy
scraping down the sides of the blender with a spatula occasionally
Serve immediately
nutrition: 211 calories; protein 9.5g; carbohydrates 35.5g; fat 3.9g; cholesterol 14.1mg; sodium 117.8mg

title: Fig Smoothie
paragraphe: Thick, and that sticky texture of figs, turn this smoothie into a yum-yum smoothie for those who like figs a lot or want to rid their fridge of this perishable fruit fast.
steps: Place the bananas, figs, milk, and orange juice into a blender.
Cover, and puree until smooth.
Pour into glasses to serve.
nutrition: 335 calories; protein 6.4g; carbohydrates 77.7g; fat 3g; cholesterol 7.3mg; sodium 41.5mg

title: Keto Chocolate Shake
paragraphe: Quick and tasty keto shake.
ingrediants: 1 medium avocado - peeled, pitted, and diced
steps: Combine almond milk, avocado, blueberries, cocoa powder, stevia powder, and MCT oil powder in a blender (such as NutriBullet®)
and blend for 30 seconds.
nutrition: 427 calories; protein 5.8g; carbohydrates 34.5g; fat 33.2g; sodium 174.4mg

title: Keto Margarita
paragraphe: Enjoy this keto margarita without feeling guilty! This recipe uses Swerveu0026reg; instead of sugar, and orange-flavored sparkling water to mimic the taste of orange liqueur.
ingrediants: 2 ½ teaspoons low-calorie natural sweetener (such as Swerve®)
2 fluid ounces orange-flavored sparkling water (such as La Croix®)
steps: Fill a shaker half-full with ice. Add tequila, lime juice, and sweetener to the shaker. Seal and shake vigorously until outside is frosted, 10 to 15 seconds
Place salt on a plate. Run 1 lime wedge along the rim of the Mason jar. Press the jar down into the salt. Fill the jar with ice cubes
Strain margarita into the jar. Top with sparkling water and stir. Garnish with remaining lime wedge
nutrition: 142 calories; protein 0.2g; carbohydrates 3.6g; sodium 5785.4mg

title: Keto Avocado-Spinach Smoothie
paragraphe: Keto avocado and spinach smoothie
ingrediants: ½ cup water, or more as needed
½ medium avocado, pitted and scooped from shell
steps: Combine coconut milk, water, ice cubes, avocado, spinach, erythritol, MCT oil, and vanilla powder in a blender.
Blend until smooth.
nutrition: 256 calories; protein 2.4g; carbohydrates 17.6g; fat 26.4g; sodium 19.5mg

title: Strawberry Banana Protein Smoothie
paragraphe: This balanced smoothie is great for a meal replacement or after a workout
steps: Place the banana, strawberries, almonds, and water into a blender
Blend to mix, then add the ice cubes and puree until smooth
Add the protein powder, and continue mixing until evenly incorporated, about 30 seconds
nutrition: 349 calories; protein 21g; carbohydrates 53.2g; fat 8.1g; sodium 194.5mg

title: Strawberry-Lime-Cilantro Smoothie
paragraphe: This refreshing strawberry and cilantro smoothie is packed with vitamins and minerals with the addition of a savory herb. A frozen banana makes it creamy and sweet
ingrediants: 1 cup frozen strawberries, slightly thawed and chopped
¼ cup chopped cilantro, leaves and stems, lightly packed
steps: Combine strawberries, banana, almond milk, ice, cilantro, lime juice, and stevia powder in a blender
Process until smooth, adding more almond milk or water for a smoother consistency.
nutrition: 222 calories; protein 3.1g; carbohydrates 54.5g; fat 2g; sodium 91.1mg

title: Strawberry Raspberry Smoothie
paragraphe: Basic smoothie made with healthy ingredients. Choose organic, pesticide-free berries, probiotic yogurt and local honey if possible
steps: Blend strawberries, raspberries, milk, yogurt, honey, and vanilla
extract in a blender until smooth.
nutrition: 318 calories; protein 11.7g; carbohydrates 58.6g; fat 4.7g; cholesterol 15.9mg; sodium 133.5mg

title: Chocolate-Covered Strawberries Smoothie
paragraphe: This delicious smoothie is totally healthy, but tastes just like fresh strawberries dipped in creamy, decadent chocolate
steps: Combine soy milk, tofu, maple syrup, and cocoa powder in a blender
pulse until smooth.
Add strawberries
blend until smooth.
nutrition: 142 calories; protein 6.7g; carbohydrates 28g; fat 1.8g; sodium 98.2mg

title: Kiwi Strawberry Smoothie
paragraphe: Fruity goodness for smoothie lovers
ingrediants: ¾ cup pineapple and orange juice blend
steps: Place the banana, strawberries, kiwi, vanilla frozen yogurt, and pineapple and orange juice blend in a blender.
Blend until smooth.
nutrition: 204 calories; protein 4.3g; carbohydrates 48.1g; fat 0.5g; cholesterol 1.5mg; sodium 33.7mg

title: Chocolate-Covered Strawberry Smoothie
paragraphe: This is a yummy nutritious shake that you can have for breakfast or a snack. There are also variations you can make to make it healthier or tastier. For a healthier smoothie, add 1 tablespoon wheat germ. If you care more about taste than nutrition, use a chocolate-milk mix like Nesquick®, and use 1/2 cup vanilla yogurt in place of the plain yogurt and vanilla extract.
ingrediants: 6 tablespoons powdered chocolate-flavored malt drink mix (such as Ovaltine®)
steps: Blend milk, strawberries, yogurt, chocolate-flavored malt drink mix, and vanilla
extract together in a blender until smooth.
nutrition: 409 calories; protein 18.4g; carbohydrates 67.8g; fat 7g; cholesterol 26.9mg; sodium 273.1mg

title: Silky Strawberry Smoothie
paragraphe: This smoothie is 100% vegan and the tofu adds an amazing silky texture.
steps: Blend strawberries, banana, ice, tofu, and agave nectar together in a blender until smooth.
nutrition: 126 calories; protein 5.4g; carbohydrates 23.6g; fat 2.1g; sodium 27.4mg

title: Tasty Strawberry Smoothie
paragraphe: Tasty and easy. Delish! A combination of three other recipes I tried
steps: lend yogurt, milk, strawberries, oats, flax, and vanilla
extract in a blender until smooth, about 30 seconds.
nutrition: 377 calories; protein 16.5g; carbohydrates 64.9g; fat 5.6g; cholesterol 22.7mg; sodium 189.2mg

title: Strawberry-Banana-Peanut Butter Smoothie
paragraphe: This creamy treat has protein and no added sugar for a yummy breakfast or dessert
steps: Place yogurt, peanut butter, banana, strawberries, and ice cubes into a blender
Puree until smooth.
nutrition: 389 calories; protein 16.2g; carbohydrates 45.6g; fat 18.8g; cholesterol 7.4mg; sodium 243mg

title: Orange Banana Smoothie
paragraphe: Filling enough to have as a breakfast - I recommend it!
ingrediants: ½ (8 ounce) container vanilla fat-free yogurt
steps: In a blender, combine milk, oranges, banana, sugar, salt and yogurt.
Blend for about 1 minute.
Insert ice cubes, and blend until smooth.
Pour into glasses and serve.
nutrition: 340 calories; protein 9.1g; carbohydrates 73.7g; fat 2.9g; cholesterol 10.7mg; sodium 90.2mg.

title: Peanut Butter Banana Smoothie
paragraphe: This peanut butter banana smoothie is so refreshing, and it's sweet and tasty.
steps: Place bananas, milk, peanut butter, honey, and ice cubes in a blender
blend until smooth, about 30 seconds.
nutrition: 335 calories; protein 12.8g; carbohydrates 34.1g; fat 18.8g; cholesterol 9.8mg; sodium 202.8mg.

title: Pineapple and Banana Smoothie
paragraphe: A gorgeous and indulgent smoothie, but totally healthy!
ingrediants: ¼ fresh pineapple - peeled, cored and cubed
steps: Place ice cubes, pineapple, banana, and pineapple juice into the bowl of a blender.
Puree on high until smooth.
nutrition: 313 calories; protein 3g; carbohydrates 78.7g; fat 0.9g; sodium 10.1mg.

title: Simple Banana Smoothie
paragraphe: A quick and easy smoothie with only a few ingredients that tastes amazing! I make this with Mott's® fresh-pressed apple juice because it's nice and thick. I also use raw blackberry honey.
steps: Blend yogurt, apple juice, honey, bananas
milk and ice cubes in a blender until smooth.
nutrition: 488 calories; protein 11.8g; carbohydrates 111g; fat 3.2g; cholesterol 9.2mg; sodium 130.7mg.

title: Kale and Banana Smoothie
paragraphe: Nutrient-rich kale is hidden in this delicious banana smoothie. perfect for those of us who have a hard time getting our daily dose of veggies
ingrediants: ½ cup light unsweetened soy milk
steps: Place the banana, kale, soy milk, flax seeds
flax seeds, and maple syrup into a blender
Cover, and puree until smooth
Serve over ice.
nutrition: 311 calories; protein 12.2g; carbohydrates 56.6g; fat 7.3g; sodium 109.8mg.

title: Milk Banana Smoothie
paragraphe: Low fat, no-sugar-added milk banana smoothie.
ingrediants: 5 (1 gram) packets low calorie granulated sugar substitute (such as Sweet 'n Low®)
steps: Blend milk, bananas, and sugar substitute in a blender or food processor until smooth.
nutrition: 280 calories; protein 10g; carbohydrates 56.8g; fat 5.4g; cholesterol 19.5mg; sodium 101.8mg.

title: Chocolate Strawberry Smoothie
paragraphe: This strawberry, banana chocolate yogurt shake makes a wonderful treat for any occasion.
steps: In a blender combine bananas, strawberries, chocolate syrup and yogurt.
Blend until smooth.
Pour into glasses and serve.
nutrition: 248 calories; protein 8.3g; carbohydrates 51.2g; fat 2.5g; cholesterol 7.4mg; sodium 101.2mg.

title: Banana Flip
paragraphe: A marvelous mouth-watering chocolate-banana milkshake!
steps: In a blender, combine banana, milk, chocolate drink mix and sugar.
Blend until smooth.
Pour into glasses and serve.
nutrition: 238 calories; protein 7.9g; carbohydrates 42.7g; fat 4.6g; cholesterol 17.1mg; sodium 103.6mg

title: B and L's Strawberry Smoothie
paragraphe: You'll love this icy cold strawberry smoothie.
steps: In a blender combine strawberries milk, yogurt, sugar and vanilla.
Toss in the ice.
Blend until smooth and creamy.
Pour into glasses and serve.
nutrition: 160 calories; protein 5.6g; carbohydrates 30.3g; fat 1.1g; cholesterol 4.9mg; sodium 71.4mg

title: Grapefruit Smoothie
paragraphe: A healthy, easy, and satisfying smoothie for those who enjoy grapefruit or are looking for a drink that is lower in sugar and calories. This is loaded with taste and is good for you!
steps: Blend grapefruit
water
spinach, ice cubes, ginger
and flax seeds in a blender or NutriBullet® until smooth
nutrition: 202 calories; protein 4.6g; carbohydrates 47.4g; fat 1g; sodium 39.4mg. Full Nutrition
